# Contributing to Roblox Studio MCP Server

Thank you for your interest in contributing!

## Code of Conduct

Please be civil and kind in all interactions. We're all here to build something useful together. Treat others with respect, be patient with newcomers, and assume good intentions.

## How to Contribute

1. Fork the repository
2. Create a branch for your changes
3. Make your changes
4. Open a Pull Request

## Pull Request Guidelines

When submitting a PR, please follow the instructions in our [PR template](/.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md).
